solar.tips: A vast cosmic journey awaits! Ensure you have essentials and be prepared for long stretches of space travel.

POIs.name: Asteroid Belt
POIs.desc: Navigate through a dense region filled with remnants from the formation of the solar system.

POIs.name: Kuiper Belt
POIs.desc: Journey beyond Neptune and witness the home of the dwarf planets and many comets.

mercury.tips: It's hot! Solar shades and protective suits are a must.

POIs.name: Caloris Basin
POIs.desc: The largest impact crater on Mercury offering a breathtaking view.

POIs.name: Shakespeare Quadrangle
POIs.desc: Named after the famous bard, this region has a complex history.

mars.tips: Oxygen packs are essential. Don't forget your space rover for traversing the rugged terrains.

POIs.name: Olympus Mons
POIs.desc: The tallest volcano in the solar system. A hiker's dream!

POIs.name: Valles Marineris
POIs.desc: A canyon that dwarfs the Grand Canyon of Earth.

jupiter.tips: Jupiter is a gas giant. Be sure to bring your gas mask and a warm jacket.

POIs.name: Great Red Spot
POIs.desc: A massive storm that has been raging for centuries.

POIs.name: Jupiter's Rings
POIs.desc: A ring system that is much fainter than Saturn's.

saturn.tips: Saturn is a gas giant. Be sure to bring your gas mask and a warm jacket.

POIs.name: Titan
POIs.desc: The largest moon of Saturn and the only moon in the solar system with a dense atmosphere.

POIs.name: Enceladus
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.

uranus.tips: Uranus is a gas giant. Be sure to bring your gas mask and a warm jacket.

POIs.name: Miranda
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.

POIs.name: Ariel
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.

POIs.name: Triton
POIs.desc: The largest moon of Neptune and the only moon in the solar system with a dense atmosphere.

POIs.name: Proteus
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.

POIs.name: Charon
POIs.desc: The largest moon of Pluto and the only moon in the solar system with a dense atmosphere.

POIs.name: Styx
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.

POIs.name: Occator Crater
POIs.desc: The largest moon of Ceres and the only moon in the solar system with a dense atmosphere.

POIs.name: Kerwan
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.

POIs.name: Hi'iaka
POIs.desc: A small moon with a surface that is mostly covered in fresh, clean ice.
